surf_stn#

Functions

crop_vol(vol_arr, i_min, i_max, j_min, ...)

Crops the given volume tensor vol_arr using the given indices.

ddf_to_disp(ddf)

Converts dense displacement field (DDF) to displacement field (disp) by subtracting the identity transformation.

get_identity(image_shape[, device])

Returns the identity transformation of the given image_shape.

interpolate_disp(disp, ras_coords, affine_matrix)

Interpolates the displacement field disp defined in voxel coordinate system at given points defined in RAS coordinate system.

ras_to_voxel(ras_coords, affine_matrix)

Converts RAS coordinates to voxel coordinates using the given affine_matrix.

surf_stn(ras_coords, ddf, affine_matrix)

Given the dense displacement field ddf defined in voxel coordinate system, and the affine matrix affine_matrix that maps voxel to RAS coordinates, interpolates the displacement field at the voxel locations corresponding to each location in ras_coords.

to_function(affine_matrix)

Converts the given affine_matrix to the corresponding function.

unstructured_interpolation(values, voxel_coords)

Sample values at given points using the interpolation mode of choice.

voxel_to_ras(voxel_coords, affine_matrix)

Converts voxel coordinates to RAS coordinates using the given affine_matrix.
